text.en: Target 1 monster on the field with 2000 or more ATK; banish it (until the End Phase of the next turn), then, if you activated this card while you controlled "Red Dragon Archfiend" or a Synchro Monster that mentions it, you can Set 1 "Fiendish Chain" from your Deck or GY.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Pulse of the King
